patterns: which is best place under budget 7000
How much money need for a trip to maharashtra
responses: maharashtra is a place for everyone, if you want to enjoy late night parties, get “bhand” , and don't have to worry about getting home early or you want to sit in peace, gazing the stars, making plans for your future while staring at the lovely horizon along with those amazingly “calm” waves brushing your feet alongwith, all you can find in maharashtra which is under 7k for 2-3 people.

There are many places in maharashtra you should visit but it’s not possible to cover all of them in 3 days under 7000. Still if you follow a plan, you can cover most of the places Plan-1 - Reach hotel till 10 am. Do Lunch and rest till 1pm. Go to Baga Beach/Calangute Beach. Stay there till mid night.We stayed in albenjoh guest house walkable distance to Calangute Beach just 300m Plan2: Dhudh Sagar waterfall’s and Old maharashtra Church’s8AM Dhudh sagar waterfall's4 PM old maharashtra Church's5PM Panaji city and shopping7PM return to Room Night 9 PM - Baga beach and Tito's street

patterns: Hill Station pune 10000 5 days yes AC hill station 3 people
responses: A gorgeous hill station near Pune, Lonavala is located at the height of 622 m in the Sahyadri mountain range that separates the Deccan plateau and the Konkan coast. One of the most visited and favoured weekend getaways for people in Mumbai and Pune, this hill retreat boasts of caves, forts, lakes, and waterfalls amidst dense timberlands and verdant greenery. It’s also known for its variety of ‘Chikki.’
